00044 Entree& Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00045 {
00046   associer_domaine(is);
00047 
00048   Domaine& domain = domaine(0);
00049   Zone&    zone   = domain.zone(0);
00050 
00051   Scatter::uninit_sequential_domain(domain);
00052 
00053   Static_Int_Lists incidence;
00054   construire_connectivite_som_elem(domain.nb_som_tot(), zone.les_elems(), incidence, 1);
00055 
00056   LIST(Nom) name_of_useless_boundaries;
00057   LIST(Nom) name_of_useless_connectors;
00058   ArrOfInt nodes_of_frontier_face;
00059   ArrOfInt cells_on_frontier_face;
00060   cells_on_frontier_face.set_smart_resize(1);
00061 
00062   {
00063     LIST_CURSEUR(Bord) cursor(zone.faces_bord());
00064     while (cursor)
00065       {
00066         const Faces& frontier_faces    = cursor.valeur().faces();
00067         const int nb_frontier_faces = frontier_faces.nb_faces_tot();
00068         const int nb_nodes_per_face = frontier_faces.nb_som_faces();
00069 
00070         nodes_of_frontier_face.resize_array(nb_nodes_per_face);
00071         cells_on_frontier_face.resize_array(0);
00072 
00073         for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes_per_face; ++i)
00074           {
00075             nodes_of_frontier_face[i] = frontier_faces.sommet(0,i);
00076           }
00077         find_adjacent_elements(incidence,nodes_of_frontier_face,cells_on_frontier_face);
00078 
00079         bool remove_frontier = false;
00080 
00081         if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() == 1)
00082           {
00083             remove_frontier = false;
00084           }
00085         else if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() == 2)
00086           {
00087             remove_frontier = true;
00088             Nom dummy;
00089             Nom& new_useless_frontier_name = name_of_useless_boundaries.add(dummy);
00090             new_useless_frontier_name = cursor.valeur().le_nom();
00091           }
00092         else
00093           {
00094             Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00095             Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00096             Process::exit();
00097           }
00098 
00099         for (int f=0; f<nb_frontier_faces; ++f)
00100           {
00101             for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes_per_face; ++i)
00102               {
00103                 nodes_of_frontier_face[i] = frontier_faces.sommet(0,i);
00104               }
00105             find_adjacent_elements(incidence,nodes_of_frontier_face,cells_on_frontier_face);
00106 
00107             if (remove_frontier)
00108               {
00109                 if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() != 2)
00110                   {
00111                     Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00112                     Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00113                     Process::exit();
00114                   }
00115               }
00116             else
00117               {
00118                 if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() != 1)
00119                   {
00120                     Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00121                     Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00122                     Process::exit();
00123                   }
00124               }
00125           }
00126         ++cursor;
00127       }
00128   }
00129 
00130   {
00131     LIST_CURSEUR(Raccord) cursor(zone.faces_raccord());
00132     while (cursor)
00133       {
00134         const Faces& frontier_faces    = cursor.valeur().valeur().faces();
00135         const int nb_frontier_faces = frontier_faces.nb_faces_tot();
00136         const int nb_nodes_per_face = frontier_faces.nb_som_faces();
00137 
00138         nodes_of_frontier_face.resize_array(nb_nodes_per_face);
00139         cells_on_frontier_face.resize_array(0);
00140 
00141         for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes_per_face; ++i)
00142           {
00143             nodes_of_frontier_face[i] = frontier_faces.sommet(0,i);
00144           }
00145         find_adjacent_elements(incidence,nodes_of_frontier_face,cells_on_frontier_face);
00146 
00147         bool remove_frontier = false;
00148 
00149         if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() == 1)
00150           {
00151             remove_frontier = false;
00152           }
00153         else if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() == 2)
00154           {
00155             remove_frontier = true;
00156             Nom dummy;
00157             Nom& new_useless_frontier_name = name_of_useless_connectors.add(dummy);
00158             new_useless_frontier_name = cursor.valeur().valeur().le_nom();
00159           }
00160         else
00161           {
00162             Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00163             Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00164             Process::exit();
00165           }
00166 
00167         for (int f=0; f<nb_frontier_faces; ++f)
00168           {
00169             for (int i=0; i<nb_nodes_per_face; ++i)
00170               {
00171                 nodes_of_frontier_face[i] = frontier_faces.sommet(0,i);
00172               }
00173             find_adjacent_elements(incidence,nodes_of_frontier_face,cells_on_frontier_face);
00174 
00175             if (remove_frontier)
00176               {
00177                 if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() != 2)
00178                   {
00179                     Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00180                     Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00181                     Process::exit();
00182                   }
00183               }
00184             else
00185               {
00186                 if (cells_on_frontier_face.size_array() != 1)
00187                   {
00188                     Cerr << "Error in 'Remove_Invalid_Internal_Boundaries::interpreter_()' :" << finl;
00189                     Cerr << "  Invalid incidence" << finl;
00190                     Process::exit();
00191                   }
00192               }
00193           }
00194         ++cursor;
00195       }
00196   }
00197 
00198   {
00199     LIST_CURSEUR(Nom) cursor(name_of_useless_boundaries);
00200     while (cursor)
00201       {
00202         Bords& boundaries = zone.faces_bord();
00203         boundaries.suppr(zone.bord(cursor.valeur()));
00204         ++cursor;
00205       }
00206   }
00207 
00208   {
00209     LIST_CURSEUR(Nom) cursor(name_of_useless_connectors);
00210     while (cursor)
00211       {
00212         Raccords& connectors = zone.faces_raccord();
00213         connectors.suppr(zone.raccord(cursor.valeur()));
00214         ++cursor;
00215       }
00216   }
00217 
00218   Scatter::init_sequential_domain(domain);
00219 
00220   return is;
00221 }
